Package com.openclassroom.safetynet.service

Class PersonService

java.lang.Object
com.openclassroom.safetynet.service.PersonService
@Service public class PersonService extends Object
Service defining the operations for managing persons.

      Updates an existing person.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the person to update.
      lastName - The last name of the person to update.
      person - The updated person PersonDTO.

    • deletePerson

      public boolean deletePerson(String firstName, String lastName)
      Deletes a person by the full name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the person to delete.
      lastName - The last name of the person to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the person was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • personCoveredByStation

      public PersonCoveredByStation personCoveredByStation(int stationNumber)
      Returns a list of people covered by a given fire station.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The fire station number.
      Returns:
      A list of PersonCoveredByStation representing the people covered by the station.

    • getPersonsAndStationInfoByAddress

      public PersonsAndStationInfo getPersonsAndStationInfoByAddress(String address)
      Returns information about the people and fire station associated with a given address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to search for. The address is used to query both the list of persons and the fire station.
      Returns:
      A PersonsAndStationInfo object containing information about the people at the given address and the fire station responsible for that address.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no persons are found at the given address, an exception is thrown.

    • personEmails

      public List<String> personEmails(String city)
      Retrieves email addresses of persons residing in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city to retrieve email addresses for .
      Returns:
      A list of String containing the extracted email addresses.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no persons are found at the given city, an exception is thrown.

    • getChildsByAddress

      public List<Child> getChildsByAddress(String address)
      Retrieves a list of Child objects from a list of persons.
      Parameters:
      address - The list of persons to extract child information from PersonDTO.
      Returns:
      A list of Child objects containing the extracted child information Child.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no persons are found at the given address, an exception is thrown.

    • getPersonsByAddress

      public List<PersonDTO> getPersonsByAddress(String address)
      Retrieves persons by address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to retrieve persons for.
      Returns:
      A list of persons residing at the specified address PersonDTO.

    • getPhoneNumbersByStation

      public List<String> getPhoneNumbersByStation(int stationNumber)
      Retrieves phone numbers of persons covered by a specific station.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The station number to retrieve phone numbers for.
      Returns:
      A list of phone numbers of persons covered by the specified station.

    • listOfPersonsByLastName

      public List<PersonsLastNameInfo> listOfPersonsByLastName(String lastName)
      Retrieves a list of PersonsLastNameInfo objects for persons with the given last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name of the persons to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of PersonsLastNameInfo objects containing the extracted information PersonsLastNameInfo.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no persons are found at the given lastName, an exception is thrown.

    • floodInfo

      public PersonFloodInfo floodInfo(List<Integer> stationNumber)
      Returns information about people affected by a flood, based on the fire station numbers.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - A list of fire station numbers.
      Returns:
      A PersonFloodInfo object containing information about the people affected by the flood.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no firestations are found at the given stationNumber list, an exception is thrown.

    • listOfPersonsByAddressByStationNumber

      public Map<String,List<MedicalRecordInfo>> listOfPersonsByAddressByStationNumber(List<FirestationDTO> firestations)
      Returns a map of fire station addresses to lists of medical record information for people located at those addresses.
      Parameters:
      firestations - A list of fire stations FirestationDTO.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are addresses and values are lists of medical record information for people at those addresses.
